name: elite-trading-coach-ai-mvp-v01
description: MVP local-first app with plan wizard, verdict, journal; Phase 2.3.3 foundation tooling.

scripts.preview:stop: pkill -f "vite preview" || true; sh -c 'pids=$(lsof -ti :5173 :5174 2>/dev/null); [ -n "$pids" ] && kill -9 $pids || true'
scripts.preview:smoke: npm run preview:stop; rm -f .preview.log; (npm run preview -- --port 0 --strictPort=false > .preview.log 2>&1 &) ; sleep 2; url=$(grep -Eo 'Local:\s+http://localhost:[0-9]+' .preview.log | head -1 | awk '{print $2}'); code=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$url" || true); npm run preview:stop; test "$code" = "200"
scripts.verify:bootstrap: npm run preview:stop; npm run build; rm -f .preview.log; (npm run preview -- --port 0 --strictPort=false > .preview.log 2>&1 &) ; sleep 2; base=$(grep -Eo 'Local:\s+http://localhost:[0-9]+' .preview.log | head -1 | awk '{print $2}'); r1=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$base/" || true); r2=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$base/js/entry-loader.js" || true); r3=$(curl -s -o /dev/null -w "%{http_code}" "$base/favicon.ico" || true); npm run preview:stop; test "$r1" = "200" -a "$r2" = "200" -a "$r3" = "200"
scripts.e2e:local: npm run preview:stop && (npm run preview -- --port 5173 --strictPort=true > .preview.log 2>&1 &) && sleep 2 && npm run e2e && npm run preview:stop
